languages.text: "Тогда я не ведал, с кем связался. Знал бы — отказал тебе в чести биться со мной плечом к плечу. Невместно воину Всеотца подчиняться приказу {mf|того|той}, чье имя запятнано. Сомкни уста, ибо в сердце моей зреет жажда свершить правосудие".

"Back then, I did not know who I was throwing in my lot with. If I had, I would have denied you the honour of fighting shoulder-to-shoulder with me. It does not befit a warrior of the Allfather to follow the orders of one whose name is tainted. Speak no more, for a craving to exact justice is brewing in my heart."
languages.original_text: "Тогда я не ведал, с кем связался. Знал бы — отказал тебе в чести биться со мной плечом к плечу. Невместно воину Всеотца подчиняться приказу {mf|того|той}, чье имя запятнано. Сомкни уста, ибо в сердце моей зреет жажда свершить правосудие".

It doesn't befit a warrior of the Allfather to follow the orders of one whose name is tainted. Speak no more, for a craving to exact justice is brewing in my heart."

It does not befit a warrior of the Allfather to follow the orders of one whose name is tainted. Speak no more, for a craving to exact justice is brewing in my heart."

languages.text: “是啊，那个时候我根本不知道自己是在和谁同流合污。如果早知道你是这样的人，我根本不会与你并肩作战。我是全父的战士，我不该听名声狼藉之人随意摆布。别再说了，因为我的怒火已经在熊熊燃烧了，我的心渴望伸张正义。”
languages.original_text: "Back then, I did not know who I was throwing in my lot with. If I had, I would have denied you the honour of fighting shoulder-to-shoulder with me. It does not befit a warrior of the Allfather to follow the orders of one whose name is tainted. Speak no more, for a craving to exact justice is brewing in my heart."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，那个时候我根本不知道自己是在和谁同流合污。如果早知道你是这样的人，我根本不会与你并肩作战。我是全父的战士，我不该听名声狼藉之人随意摆布。别再说了，因为我的怒火已经在熊熊燃烧了，我的心渴望伸张正义。”

languages.text: 「当時は、自分がどんな人間と手を組んでいるのか知らなかった。もし知っていたなら、お前が俺と肩を並べて戦う名誉を否定していたよ。全知の父の戦士にとっては、汚れた名誉を持つ者の命令に従うなど得がない。もうこれ以上喋るな。正義を貫く渇望が、俺の心に芽生えていく」
languages.original_text: "Back then, I did not know who I was throwing in my lot with. If I had, I would have denied you the honour of fighting shoulder-to-shoulder with me. It does not befit a warrior of the Allfather to follow the orders of one whose name is tainted. Speak no more, for a craving to exact justice is brewing in my heart."

traits.locale_text: 「当時は、自分がどんな人間と手を組んでいるのか知らなかった。もし知っていたなら、お前が俺と肩を並べて戦う名誉を否定していたよ。全知の父の戦士にとっては、汚れた名誉を持つ者の命令に従うなど得がない。もうこれ以上喋るな。正義を貫く渇望が、俺の心に芽生えていく」

languages.text: «Por aquel entonces no sabía con quién me estaba jugando el pellejo. De haberlo sabido, le habría negado el honor de luchar codo con codo. No es propio de un guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas seguir las órdenes de alguien cuyo nombre está manchado. No diga nada más, porque en mi corazón se está gestando el ansia de hacer justicia».
languages.original_text: "Back then, I did not know who I was throwing in my lot with. If I had, I would have denied you the honour of fighting shoulder-to-shoulder with me. It does not befit a warrior of the Allfather to follow the orders of one whose name is tainted. Speak no more, for a craving to exact justice is brewing in my heart."

traits.locale_text: «Por aquel entonces no sabía con quién me estaba jugando el pellejo. De haberlo sabido, le habría negado el honor de luchar codo con codo. No es propio de un guerrero del Padre de todas las cosas seguir las órdenes de alguien cuyo nombre está manchado. No diga nada más, porque en mi corazón se está gestando el ansia de hacer justicia».

languages.text: "Damals wusste ich nicht, mit wem ich mich einlasse. Hätte ich es gewusst, so hätte ich Euch die Ehre verwehrt, Schulter an Schulter mit mir zu kämpfen. Es geziemt sich für einen Krieger des Allvaters nicht, den Befehlen {mf|eines Mannes zu folgen, dessen|einer Frau zu folgen, deren} Name besudelt ist. Sprecht kein Wort mehr, denn in meinem Herzen erstarkt der Wunsch, Gerechtigkeit zu üben."
languages.original_text: "Back then, I did not know who I was throwing in my lot with. If I had, I would have denied you the honour of fighting shoulder-to-shoulder with me. It does not befit a warrior of the Allfather to follow the orders of one whose name is tainted. Speak no more, for a craving to exact justice is brewing in my heart."

traits.locale_text: "Damals wusste ich nicht, mit wem ich mich einlasse. Hätte ich es gewusst, so hätte ich Euch die Ehre verwehrt, Schulter an Schulter mit mir zu kämpfen. Es geziemt sich für einen Krieger des Allvaters nicht, den Befehlen {mf|eines Mannes zu folgen, dessen|einer Frau zu folgen, deren} Name besudelt ist. Sprecht kein Wort mehr, denn in meinem Herzen erstarkt der Wunsch, Gerechtigkeit zu üben."

languages.text: « Si j'avais su à qui j'avais réellement affaire, jamais je ne vous aurais accordé l'honneur de vous battre à mes côtés. Un guerrier du Père de Tous ne peut pas se permettre de suivre les ordres de quelqu'un dont le nom est souillé. Et maintenant, je vous conseille de ne rien ajouter, car mon cœur brûle d'envie de se faire justice. »
languages.original_text: "Back then, I did not know who I was throwing in my lot with. If I had, I would have denied you the honour of fighting shoulder-to-shoulder with me. It does not befit a warrior of the Allfather to follow the orders of one whose name is tainted. Speak no more, for a craving to exact justice is brewing in my heart."

Un guerrier du Père de Tous ne peut pas se permettre de suivre les ordres de quelqu'un dont le nom est souillé. Et maintenant, je vous conseille de ne rien ajouter, car mon cœur brûle d'envie de se faire justice. »

languages.text: "O gün kiminle saf tuttuğumuzu bilmiyordum. Bilseydim benimle omuz omuza savaşma onurunu sana tattırmazdım. Namı kirli birinden emir almak, Yücebaba'nın bir savaşçısına yaraşmaz. Daha da konuşma, adaletin gereğini yapmak için can atıyorum zaten."
languages.original_text: "Back then, I did not know who I was throwing in my lot with. If I had, I would have denied you the honour of fighting shoulder-to-shoulder with me. It does not befit a warrior of the Allfather to follow the orders of one whose name is tainted. Speak no more, for a craving to exact justice is brewing in my heart."
